net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators
Class Calculator

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators.Calculator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, ICalculator
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractLinesOfCode, InheritanceDepth, LackOfCohesion, LinesOfCode, McCabe, NestedBlockDepth, Norm, NumberOfAttributes, NumberOfMethods, NumberOfParameters, Propagator, RMartinCouplings, SpecializationIndex
public abstract class Calculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants, ICalculator

Abstract base class for all metrics calculators. Real calculators must implement the calculate method and a no argument default constructor.

Author:
Frank Sauer
